nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy freezing drizzle and isolated snow showers. Cloudy, with a low around 26. West wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.shortForecast: Patchy Freezing Drizzle then Patchy Fog
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy freezing drizzle and isolated snow showers before 10am, then patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. South wind 2 to 6 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. West wind around 6 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 9am. Cloudy, with a high near 39. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely before 10pm, then snow and patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 38. Northwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 1pm, then a chance of rain between 1pm and 4pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. Northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 9am, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. Northeast wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. North wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 35. North wind around 12 mph.
